CustomField.description: This field is set to true if all steps in this process should be auto-escalated by the system if it not approved, rejected, or reassigned by the expected completion date.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is set to true if all steps in this process should be auto-escalated by the system if it not approved, rejected, or reassigned by the expected completion date.
CustomField.label: Process Auto Escalate
